articles.title: Kim Jong Il Watches Volleyball Match
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Watches Volleyball Match
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il watched the volleyball match held between the "April 25" Team of the KPA and a volleyball selection on the occasion of the lunar New Year.
					When he appeared on the grandstand, all the spectators enthusiastically welcomed him, offering him lunar New Year greetings representing the unanimous reverence of all the servicepersons and people for him. 
					
					The two teams played an excellent game by fully displaying the technique they have tirelessly cultivated in their day-to-day trainings true to the sports policy of the WPK.
					
					 The "April 25" team beat the selection in the match.
					
					After watching the game, he expressed great satisfaction over the splendid match the revolutionary and militant volleyball players played by fully displaying the might of the ideological, fighting spirit, speed and technical battle and congratulated them on their success.
					
					 He said that to develop sports is a very important work of great significance not only in successfully pushing ahead with the revolutionary struggle and construction to augment the might of the country but in boosting the friendly ties with different countries of the world.
					
					 Sports have become popular and a part of people's daily life in our country and as a result all of them are fully prepared for labor and national defence and our sportspersons have achieved shining successes in international games, fully demonstrating the honor of Juche Korea and the spirit of the Korean people, he noted, adding that these admirable achievements are a clear proof of the validity and great vitality of the WPK's sports policy.
					
					 He set forth highly important tasks which would serve as guidelines for rapidly developing the sports of the country, underscoring the need to round off the Korean-style sports technique and tactical system and training methods to put the sports technique on a higher level.
					
					 Among the spectators were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek and Kim Yang Gon, department directors of the C.C., the WPK, and Kang Sok Ju, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Je Gang and Ri Jae Il, first vice department directors of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Ki Ryong, director general of the Korean Central News Agency, Cha Sung Su, chairman of the Central Broadcasting Committee of Korea, and other leading officials, KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Myong Guk and Ri Myong Su and other commanding officers of the army.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Appreciates Performance
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Appreciates Performance
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il appreciated a performance given by the song and dance ensembles of the KPA Naval Command and the Air Command.
					Their artistes put on the stage female quartet "The General Is among Soldiers", dialogic poem "Unforgettable Sailing to Cho Islet", instrumental music and song "The Sound of a Horse's Hooves in Mt. Paektu", mixed duet and pangchang "Arirang of Army-People Unity", male solo "Soldiers Live Near the General", dance "Seamen Who Protected Slogan-Bearing Trees", mixed small chorus "We Will Be 7th Regiment Today" and other colorful numbers of various genres.
					
					The performers truthfully represented the invincible might of the heroic Korean People's Army which has grown to be a matchless army under the loving care of Kim Jong Il, an illustrious commander, and the strong faith and will of the servicepersons of the KPA to devotedly safeguard the headquarters of the revolution and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms.
					
					He expressed great satisfaction over the splendid performance given by the above-said artistes as befitting artistes of the revolutionary army and highly praised them for their successes made in conducting revolutionary and militant performing activities instilling into servicepersons the conviction of sure victory and optimism and the spirit and courage to wipe out the enemy. 
					
					After acquainting himself in detail with the activities of the ensembles, he set forth important tasks to be implemented by them to further intensify the performing activities among servicepersons. 
					
					Among the audience were Generals of the KPA Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Myong Guk and Ri Myong Su, Senior Vice Admiral Jong Myong Do, commander of the Navy, and Colonel General Ri Pyong Chol, commander of the Air Force, and other commanding officers of the army, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek and Kim Yang Gon, department directors of the C.C., the WPK, Kang Sok Ju, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Je Gang and  Ri Jae Il, first vice department directors of the C.C., the WPK, and Kim Ki Ryong, director general of the Korean Central News Agency, and Cha Sung Su, chairman of the Central Broadcasting Committee of Korea, and other leading officials.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Sovereignty and Prosperity in Developing Countries
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Sovereignty and Prosperity in Developing Countries
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The present era calls upon developing countries to make energetic efforts to tap all their human and material potentials to the maximum and thus outpace advanced countries, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Science and technology provide a sure guarantee for the independent development and national prosperity in developing countries in the new century.
					
					 No matter what high goal of development developing countries may set to make rapid progress, this will prove to be a mere desire unless it is supported by science and technology. Imperialists resort to arbitrary and unilateral actions, looking down upon developing countries and dictating them. This behavior is prompted by their arrogance and self-complacency that they have advanced science and technology.
					
					 Imperialists calculate that developing countries can neither live on nor achieve material prosperity unless they depend on them because of their backward science and technology no matter how big they have resources and population. 
					
					 The present century is the century in which mankind makes a leap forward at the speed surpassing human imagination on the basis of the intellectual ability reached by it. It is the science and technology that provides a sure guarantee for the independent development and national prosperity in developing countries to suit the trend of the development in this era. 
					
					 Science and technology serve as a key factor of making it possible for developing countries to achieve leaping progress and national prosperity in the present century.
					
					There is a bright prospect for developing countries in their efforts to achieve scientific and technical development and material economic prosperity in the 21 century. They do not want to remain in the backward state but are striving hard to achieve a high goal to achieve independent development and national prosperity to suit the specific conditions of their countries and meet people's desire. They will bring about new changes in the field of science and technology and thus attain the high goal of their independent development and national prosperity in the new century.

articles.title: Puppet Prosecution's Suppression of Teachers Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Puppet Prosecution's Suppression of Teachers Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union of south Korea (Jongyojo) released a statement on Jan. 22 condemning the puppet prosecution for suppressing teachers affiliated to it. 
					 The statement accused the prosecution of trying to prosecute 13 incumbent teachers affiliated to Jongyojo on the charge that they conducted an "illegal election campaign" during the "election of the Seoul education superintendent" last year.
					
					 It recalled that the prosecution announced the results of the mid-term investigation defending the present Seoul education superintendent who spent a stupendous amount of money during the above-said election, denouncing it for suppressing even teachers affiliated to Jongyojo by linking them to the above-mentioned charge, lending no ear to the voices of the people condemning the prosecution's action as "one siding with the regime" and "killing those forces critical of it." 
					
					 The statement demanded the prosecution stop acting a "waiting maid for the ruling force," retract the indictment against the incumbent teachers and conduct an investigation into the irregularities and corruption committed by the present Seoul education superintendent.

articles.title: DPRK Praised by Romanian Party Leader
articles.content:
DPRK Praised by Romanian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea is making a dynamic advance along the road of socialism, unaffected by any economic crisis thanks to the idea and theory of developing the socialist economy enunciated by President Kim Il Sung.
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Romania who is chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, said this in a statement titled "Socialist Korea" made public on Jan. 19.
					
					 The DPRK is a socialist country founded and developed by Kim Il Sung, its eternal President, he noted, and went on:
					
					 The President expounded the idea and theory of building a powerful state. 
					
					The idea and theory on social development set forth by him are based on the man-centered philosophy.
					
					 The DPRK is growing stronger as it regards the legacy left by the President as guidelines. 
					
					 The present world requires changes in the political and economic systems, he said, and continued:
					
					 The socialist system of the DPRK based on the planned economy is the most ideal social system for mankind.
					
					 The leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the socialist planned economy left as a legacy by the President provide a guarantee for strengthening and developing the DPRK.

articles.title: February Holiday Observed in Mexico
articles.content:
February Holiday Observed in Mexico
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea released bulletin No. 31 which carried a photo of General Secretary Kim Jong Il giving field guidance to Hamhung University of Medicine, in the run-up to the February holiday, his birthday.
					The bulletin said in an article that the Korean people together with other progressives of the world are celebrating the birthday of Kim Jong Il as the greatest national jubilee.
					
					Socialist Korea has achieved only victories by standing the severe test of history, the bulletin noted, adding that these have been possible thanks to the devoted services he has rendered, dedicating his all to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people.
					
					Kim Jong Il has devoted himself to protecting the dignity of the country and the sovereignty of the nation, the bulletin said, and continued:
					
					Kim Jong Il is totally dedicated to the people's happiness and the prosperity of the country. 
					
					A great change is taking place in the life of the Korean people thanks to the long journeys of devoted service he has made to mix with people and bring happiness to them. 
					
					He has energetically worked to achieve national reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, regarding it as his noble mission.
					
					It was thanks to his bold decision that a north-south summit took place in June, 2000, 55 years after the division of Korea, the June 15 joint declaration, a milestone of its reunification, was published and the Oct. 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it, was adopted in October, 2007.

articles.title: Ciencia y tecnologia sirven de garantia de soberania y prosperidad
articles.content:
Ciencia y tecnologia sirven de garantia de soberania y prosperidad
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ATCC) -- La epoca actual exige a los paises en vias de desarrollo librar una dinamica lucha por alcanzar a los paises desarrollados poniendo de pleno manifiesto todas las potencialidades humanas y materiales de sus respectivos paises.
					Asi senala el rotativo Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este miercoles y continua:
					
					La ciencia y la tecnologia constituyen la potente garantia que en el nuevo siglo impulsa el desarrollo independiente y la prosperidad nacional de los paises en vias de desarrollo.
					
					Solo pasara de ser una vana ilusion la meta de desarrollo tan elevada que los paises en vias de desarrollo presenten a partir de su deseo a avanzar con rapidez sin apoyo cientifico y tecnico.
					
					El presente siglo es la centuria en que salta con inimaginable velocidad valiendose de la capacidad intelectual alcanzada por la humanidad. La confiable garantia para el desarrollo independiente y la prosperidad nacional de los paises en vias de desarrollo conforme a la tendencia de la epoca en desarrollo, es la ciencia y la tecnologia. Estas constituyen un factor principal para lograr el vertiginoso desarrollo y la prosperidad nacional de ellos en el actual siglo.
					
					Es muy radiante la perspectiva de los paises en vias de desarrollo dispuestos a lograr el progreso cientifico y tecnico y la prosperidad material y economica en el sigo XXI.
					
					 Estos paises no quieren quedar en el estado atrasado sino presentan la alta meta de lucha por el desarrollo independiente y la prosperidad nacional conforme a la realidad concreta de sus respectivos paises y la aspiracion de los pueblos y luchan activamente por su realizacion.
					
					 Los paises en vias de desarrollo causaran nuevos cambios en las ramas de la ciencia y tecnica y conquistaran la alta meta para el desarrollo independiente y la prosperidad nacional en el nuevo siglo.

articles.title: Corea avanza con vigor por camino socialista, destaca politico rumano
articles.content:
Corea avanza con vigor por camino socialista, destaca politico rumano
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ATCC) -- En virtud de la idea y la teoria del desarrollo economico socialista dilucidadas por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, Corea avanza con vigor por el camino socialista sin dejarse afectar ante cualquier crisis economica.
					Asi senalo el presidente del Consejo Supremo del Partido Socialista de Rumania y presidente del Comite Nacional de Rumania para el Estudio de la Idea Juche, Vasile Orleanu, en su declaracion intitulada "Corea Socialista", publicada el dia 19.
					
					La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea es el pais socialista edificado y desarrollado por el camarada Kim Il Sung, eterno Presidente, subrayo el politico rumano y continuo:
					
					El Presidente presento la idea y teoria sobre la construccion de un poderoso Estado.
					
					Su idea y teoria acerca del desarrollo social se basan en la filosofia humanocentrica.
					
					La RPDC se fortalece y se desarrolla aun mas  gracias al legado dejado por el Presidente.
					
					En la epoca actual, el mundo exige el cambio del regimen politico y economico.
					
					El regimen socialista de Corea basado en la economia planificada es el mas ideal regimen social de la humanidad.
					
					La direccion del gran camarada Kim Jong Il y la economia planificada socialista, que el Presidente dejo como el legado, sirven de una garantia para el fortalecimiento de la RPDC, Estado socialista.
